entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:46 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
